text: @RandPaul Sincerely hope U make a speedy recovery. Also sincerely hope surviving #COVID19 will help U to understand that U nor any other politician dare play politics with people's lives. U can never again delay or block bills which put people's lives in jeopardy. @senatemajldr @SenateGOP
